item.title: 大英博物馆失窃丑闻揭穿“普世”的掠夺谎言
item.description: What a Scandal at the British Museum Reveals JASON FELCH The news that roughly 2,000 objects, dating from antiquity to the 19th century, have disappeared over a decade from the vast storerooms of the British Museum — a fact the museum acknowledged a few weeks ago — should be enough to endanger the job security of any museum’s director.
